plot: A psychologist gets inside of the minds of both killers and victims to aid the police in solving gruesome serial killings in Northern England.
plot_en: A psychologist gets inside of the minds of both killers and victims to aid the police in solving gruesome serial killings in Northern England.
plot_es: A psychologist gets inside of the minds of both killers and victims to aid the police in solving gruesome serial killings in Northern England.
title: Wire in the Blood
